indicators.description: People with disabilities enjoy and exercise legal capacity on an equal basis

measures.title: No disability-based exclusions
measures.description: Provisions fully guard against restricting or excluding people, based on a disability diagnosis or status, from enjoying or exercising legal capacity.
measures.type: Ability-based and disability-based criteria for legal capacity

measures.title: No adverse impact of disability-neutral provisions
measures.description: Provisions regulating the exercise of legal capacity do not have an adverse effect on the exercise and enjoyment of legal capacity by people with disabilities
measures.type: Disability-neutral legal capacity restrictions

indicators.description: A person's will and preferences ground the legal recognition for a person to enjoy and exercise legal capacity

measures.title: Legal capacity grounded on will and preferences
measures.description: The provision recognizes that the exercise of legal capacity is grounded upon a person’s will and preferences
measures.type: Conditions for exercising legal capacity

indicators.description: The legal regime recognizes that persons may  exercise legal capacity independently or interdependently and may use a range of decision-making supports to do so

measures.title: Recognition of full range of decision-making supports
measures.description: The provision recognizes a full range of supports that may be required for exercising legal capacity independently or interdependently
measures.type: Whether legal capacity can be exercised with decision-making supports

measures.title: Best interpretation of will and preferences
measures.description: The provision recognizes the principle of best interpretation of a person's will and preferences where interpretive support is required
measures.type: Whether interpretive supports can be used, and principles to guide interpretation of a person's wishes, will, or preferences

indicators.description: All persons, without discrimination based on disability are authorized to make, change and terminate decision-making support arrangements and agreements that enable them to exercise legal capacity independently or interdependently

measures.title: Supported decision making agreements for both independent and inter-dependent legal capacity
measures.description: The provision enables persons to make supported decision-making agreements for exercising legal capacity independently or interdependently
measures.type: Opportunity and eligibility for making supported decision-making agreements

measures.title: Full scope for appointing decision-making supporters
measures.description: The provision enables decision-making supporters to be appointed where a person is unable to make these appointments on their own
measures.type: Appointing decision-making supporters where a person is unable

measures.title: Independent decision making - duties of decision making supports
measures.description: The provision recognizes duties of decision-making supporters to respect, enhance and maximize autonomy where legal capacity is exercised independently
measures.type: Duties of decision-making supporters - for people who exercise legal capacity independently

measures.title: Inter-dependent decision making - duties of decision making supports
measures.description: The provision explicitly recognizes duties of decision-making supporters to respect, enhance and maximize autonomy where legal capacity is exercised  interdependently
measures.type: Duties of decision-making supporters - for people who exercise legal capacity interdependently

measures.title: Liability protection for decision-making supporters
measures.description: The provision provides liability protection for decision-making supporters to the extent they meet their obligations.
measures.type: Liability of decision-making supporters

measures.title: Able to change and terminate supported decision-making agreements
measures.description: The provisions establishes mechanisms for changing and terminating supported decision-making agreements
measures.type: Changing/terminating supported decision-making agreements

measures.title: Effectively addresses concerns about decision-making supporters
measures.description: Provisions mandate procedures for accessible and timely interventions where there is concern that decision-making supporters may not be fulfilling  their obligations in supporting a person to exercise legal capacity, including:

measures.title: Able to make complaints about decision-making supporters
measures.description: Provision for making complaints that decision-making supporters are not fulfilling their obligations
measures.type: Making complaints about decision-making supports

measures.title: Process to evaluate and investigate concerns
measures.description: Provision for evaluating concerns and investigating where necessary
measures.type: Investigating complaints about decision-making supporters

measures.title: Able to remedy issues
measures.description: Provision for remedying any issues that arise (e.g., appointing monitors, providing additional supports)
measures.type: Remedying concerns about decision-making support arrangements

measures.title: Effective appeals and dispute resolution processes
measures.description: Provision for appeals and disputes resolutions with respect to concerns reported, investigations and remedies.
measures.type: Appeals and disputes resolution about decision-making supports

measures.title: Liability protection for third parties in supported decision-making process
measures.description: The provision offers liability protection for honoring decisions made with decision-making supports, and decisions where a person refuses supports which they may not require to exercise legal capacity
measures.type: Liability protection for entering legal agreements through a supported decision-making process

indicators.description: Decision-making supporters or representatives legally authorized under supported decision-making arrangements have a right to all information and documents to which the person is entitled

measures.title: Access by decision-making supporters to personal information and records
measures.description: The provision enables access by decision-making supporters to personal information and records, related to the supporter’s area of authority under the relevant support agreement or arrangement
measures.type: Protection of personal information

indicators.description: Access to needed decision-making supports is guaranteed, and processes are mandated to assist a person in arranging them, including at any point where a person may have independent or interdependent decision-making capability questioned

measures.title: Guaranteed access to decision-making supports
measures.description: The provision recognizes a government obligation to ensure access to decision-making supports a person may require to  exercise legal capacity
measures.type: Access provided to decision-making supports, and role government plays in ensuring access

measures.title: Mandated exploration of options to meet decision-making support needs
measures.description: The provision mandates exploration of options to meet decision-making support needs at all points where decision-making capability is questioned and/or needs to be enhanced.
measures.type: What happens when a person's capacity to act legally independently is questioned

measures.title: Effective remedies to address lack of decision-making supports
measures.description: Provision for accessible and fair complaints and enforcement mechanisms to remedy lack of access to decision-making supports a person may require to exercise legal capacity
measures.type: Complaints and enforcement mechanisms to address and remedy lack of access to needed decision-making supports

indicators.description: Parties have a duty accommodate a person in exercising legal capacity either independently or interdependently

measures.title: Duty to accommodate in decision making
measures.description: Provision recognizes the duty of all parties to accommodate persons in decision-making processes related to the exercise of their legal capacity, either independently or interdependently
measures.type: Duty to accommodate provisions

measures.title: Guidance on the duty to accommodate in exercising legal capacity
measures.description: Provision gives guidance on how to accommodate persons in exercising legal capacity either independently or interdependently
measures.type: Guidance provisions on the duty to accommodate

measures.title: Effective remedies to address lack of accommodation
measures.description: Provision for accessible and fair complaints and enforcement mechanisms to remedy lack of accommodation in exercising legal capacity independently or interdependently.
measures.type: Complaints and enforcement mechanisms to address lack of accommodation in exercising legal capacity

indicators.description: All persons are authorized to make plans to guide their decision making in the future, and such plans can specify: a) the decisions to be made, b) instructions to guide decision making, c) those who will assist a person in making decisions, and/or d) those who may make decisions on a person's behalf

measures.title: Provide for advance planning tools
measures.description: Provision gives legal recognition and authority to a full range of tools to make plans for future decision making, consistent with the right to make decisions on an equal basis with others. Options for future planning include:

measures.title: Advance planning for personal care and life decisions
measures.description: Provision authorizes advance planning documents - for  personal care and life decisions - which a person makes independently
measures.type: The making and authority of advance planning documents for personal care and life decisions

measures.title: Advance planning for health care decisions
measures.description: Provision authorizes advance planning documents - for  health care decisions - which a person makes independently
measures.type: The making and authority of advance planning documents for health care decisions

measures.title: Advance planning for financial/property decisions
measures.description: Provision authorizes advance planning documents - for financial/property decisions - which a person makes independently
measures.type: The making and authority of advance planning documents for financial/property decisions

measures.title: Appointing decision-making supporters to act as representatives
measures.description: Provision authorizes the appointment of persons to represent a person in decision making, under supported decision making agreements.
measures.type: The making and authority of supported decision making agreements

measures.title: Authority of future planning documents
measures.description: Provision ensures that the instructions a person specifies in their future planning documents cannot be over-ridden except where a) doing so would not be consistent with acting on an equal basis or b) doing so would violate best interpretation of a person
measures.type: Circumstances in which the authority and direction granted by planning documents can be over-ridden

description: Scope for Balancing Right to Equality

indicators.description: Where a person is in a situation that is causing or could cause serious harm, any measure to restrict their exercise of legal capacity, or to require them to use supports to make decisions, can be imposed only after a full and fair process to assess the need for restrictions and reasonable alternatives under the circumstances

measures.title: Measures to restrict legal capacity or to require use of decision-making supports are only imposed after a full and air process
measures.description: Provisions for restricting the exercise of legal capacity in a situation that is causing, or could cause, serious harm, ensure as follows:

measures.title: Restrictive measures are a last resort
measures.description: The provision ensures that restrictive measures are applied only as a last resort, and after all reasonable steps to ensure access to needed decision-making supports have failed
measures.type: Conditions on which legal capacity can be restricted in situations of risk/harm

measures.title: Measures are least restrictive
measures.description: The provision ensures that any restrictive measures are the least restrictive in the circumstances
measures.type: Principles to be applied in deciding nature and scope of restrictions in situations of risk/harm

measures.title: Restrictive measures are proportional and tailored
measures.description: The provision ensures that any restrictive measures are proportional and tailored to the person’s circumstances;
measures.type: How restrictions are/are not required to be tailored to individual circumstances in situations of risk/harm

measures.title: Restrictive measures are time-limited
measures.description: The provision ensures that any restrictive measure is applied for only as long as is necessary to address or prevent the serious harm;
measures.type: Duration of restrictions in situations of risk/harm

measures.title: Restrictive measures are subject to regular review
measures.description: The provision ensures that restrictive measures are subject to regular review by a competent authority to assess whether the benefits outweigh the harms and that the need for such restrictions continues to be justified;
measures.type: Nature and timeliness of review of restrictions imposed to address situations of risk/harm

measures.title: Restrictive measures combined with establishing decision-making supports
measures.description: The provision ensures that imposition of restrictive measures are combined with steps to establish decision-making supports and restore legal capacity as soon as practically possible;
measures.type: Requirements to put decision-making supports into place in situations of risk/harm where a person's legal capacity is restricted

measures.title: Decision-making supports can be monitored as needed
measures.description: The provision ensures decision-making supports may be monitored as may be needed under the circumstances;
measures.type: Monitoring of decision-making support arrangements in situations of risk/harm

measures.title: Restrictive measures are subject to appeal
measures.description: The provision ensures that imposition of restrictive measures are subject to appeal through accessible and timely appeals and enforcement mechanisms.
measures.type: Appeals and enforcement mechanisms in place to challenge restrictions of legal capacity in situations of risk/harm
